General.Name: Kedge Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Kedge Construction Co., Ltd. constructs, develops, leases, and sells housing and building properties in Taiwan. The company engages in the electrical equipment and fire safety equipment installation, etc.; general investment activities; and undertaking of contracting business of residential property and public construction. Kedge Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 131, Heping East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106
